bike.description: High Modulus D-6 carbon with aero shaped tubes, Internal cable routing, EST (extended seat tube), Integrated Alloy cupped head tube, Double water bottle mounts.. Rear triangle: High Modulus D-6 carbon aero stays w/ BC (brake cavity) design, cold forged dropout with replaceable hanger

components.description: Oval RB-725 Forged Alloy U Type w/Cartridge Pads
FC-440 Fuji Carbon Aero Monocoque w/ 1 1/8" Carbon Steerer w/Internal routing
Shimano Ultegra Hollow Tech II w/ Integrated Spindle, 7075 CNC Hollow 39/53T Chainring
Shimano Dura Ace TT Bar End Type, 20-speed
Oval W-985 Carbon Rim w/ Alloy Braking Surface, 78mm rim-700c
Vittoria Diamante Pro II 700x23c, Kevlar Bead-Folding
Cane Creek IS-8i 1 1/8" Integrated Road, with convex hollow Alloy 25mm spacer
Oval R-900 Carbon Alloy matrix, 31.8mm, +/-6 degrees
Oval ST-700 Tri w/ Ti rails
